core.name: Starlight Blessing
core.description:
Leader Bonus:
Star Eater: Team gains 18% max HP during combat, and MECH-type characters gain 10% Crit Rate during battle.

subskills.name: Star Eater
subskills.description: Team gains 18% max HP during combat, and MECH-type characters gain 10% Crit Rate during battle.

core.name: Combo: Galactic Collapse
core.description:
Tap and hold after the 1st Sequence of the Basic ATK to unleash Combo ATK.
Kinetic Energy (KE) maxes out at 900 (3 stacks of 300 KE each) and slowly regenerates when character is deployed. Combo ATK effect is based on amount of KE stacks filled.
0 KE: 2x60% ATK of Physical DMG.
1 stack (1-300 KE): 3x170% ATK of Physical DMG.
2 stacks (301-600 KE): 5x200% ATK of Physical DMG.
3 stacks (601-900 KE): 2-stack effect plus homing missiles that deal up to 4x250% ATK of Physical DMG.

subskills.name: Switch: Modgud Impact
subskills.description: Switch entry directly unleashes the 3rd hit (upper kick), dealing 160% ATK of Physical DMG.

subskills.name: QTE: Hela's Geyser
subskills.description: QTE: Triggered when enemy is frozen: directly launch a powerful Cannon ATK, dealing 5x160% ATK of Physical DMG.

subskills.name: Garm Unbound
subskills.description: On hit, Combo ATK ignites shielded enemies, deals 30% ATK of Fire DMG per 0.5s for 10s, and inflicts 2 Ignite Trauma.

subskills.name: Scorching Meteor
subskills.description: Basic ATKs against frozen enemy additionally deals 35.0% ATK of Fire DMG.

core.name: Death Nova
core.description:
Summon a gun turret for battle.
Deploys the Eljudnir gun turret [Summoned] that fires 40 penetrating light bullets, dealing 35% Physical DMG for each shot.
SP Cost: 60

subskills.name: Holy Defender I: Sloth
subskills.description: Turret summoning grants 300.0 Kinetic Energy immediately. When the turret deploys, character deals 450.0% ATK of Physical DMG to nearby enemies.

subskills.name: Holy Defender II: Idleness
subskills.description: For 6s after summoning the turret, team gains 35.0% Move Speed and 30.0% Attack Speed.

subskills.name: Meteor Eternia
subskills.description: Each time the turret fires a projectile, deal an additional 15.0% ATK of Physical DMG.

core.name: Sternenphantom
core.description:
Quickly evades enemy attack. Can be performed twice in a row.
Within a short duration after Ultimate Evasion, tap [ATK] to quickly dash to the enemy and unleash a Flying Kick that can be linked to the 4th sequence of the Basic ATK.
Time Fracture: Triggered upon an Ultimate Evasion and slows the speed of all enemies for 3s. CD: 15s.

subskills.name: Deathly Space
subskills.description: Shortens CD of Time Fracture by 4.0s.

core.name: Torrential Nebula
core.description:
6-sequence Gun Kata.
Mechanically enhanced 6-sequence Gun Kata:
1st Sequence: 2x50% ATK of Physical DMG.
2nd Sequence: 3x40% ATK of Physical DMG.
3rd Sequence: 3x50%+50% ATK of Physical DMG.
4th Sequence: 100%x150% ATK of Physical DMG.
5th Sequence: 10x50%+100% ATK of Physical DMG.
6th Sequence: 3x100% ATK of Physical DMG.

subskills.name: Deep Gravity
subskills.description: The 6-sequence Basic ATK gains 50.0% Crit DMG and restores 20.0 Kinetic Energy for the Valkyrie when scoring a Crit hit.

subskills.name: Impalpable Entity
subskills.description: When breaking a shield, Basic/Combo ATK deal 180.1% ATK of bonus Physical DMG in a small area, stun enemies in range for 5s, and inflict 3 Stun Trauma.

subskills.name: Stygian Aurora
subskills.description: When Basic ATK interrupts an enemy, there is a 40.0% chance to stun the enemy for 5s and inflict 3 Stun Trauma. CD: 7s.
